item.title: Peace During Financial Breakdown
item.description:
http://www.matthewferry.com, Trick to staying in good spirits while you are in the middle of financial breakdown is to make sure that you forecast out what is the worst possible thing that could happen to you in this particular breakdown and you make peace with it. If you will fantasize what is the worst possible thing and then you make peace with that, you will be at peace now in the process, and that’s the goal.

item.title: Acceptance Leads to Happiness
item.description:
When you are attached, things do not really work very well. People say, Well, you need to detach.
 Right?
Well, what does that mean exactly?
It means that you come to grips with the outcomes of your goals and dreams being okay if they fail or if they succeed, or anywhere in between. You detach.

Please check out this powerful training program, and get on your way to achieving massive action!
http://www.matthewferry.com/massiveaction/

item.title: Darkness is a part of the Success Process
item.description:
You don’t know darkness unless you know light. And you don’t know light unless you know darkness. The darkness is a mandatory part of the process. If you have a goal to achieve more success, more money, greater projects, greater prosperity, you’ve got to go through those times of incredible doubt, despair, freaking out, worry, concern – those things just come up. And what they do is they cause you to consider what is next. They cause you to consider what might be missing. So, you have to have those dark moments. I just want you take this thought into your body: Success ultimately is nothing more than a series of well-managed breakdowns.


Please check out this powerful training program, and get on your way to achieving massive action!
http://www.matthewferry.com/massiveaction/

item.title: Inspired Action is the Most Effective
item.description:
If you take action without inspiration your result is gonna be okay. But if you take action from a place of being totally inspired – the results are unbelievable. You could get two times, three times, four times the results from being inspired.

Over Come The 6 Invisible Barriers To Success & Have Your Best Year Ever in 2011

http://www.matthewferry.com/bestyearever2011/

item.title: Contrast is Necessary in Your Life
item.description:
When you set goals, when you write out intentions or dream, what that does is that it immediately creates contrast. So, think about it like this; you set the goal to be kind. In that moment, instantaneously, all the things in your life that piss you off come up.

Please check out this powerful training program, and get on your way to achieving massive action!
http://matthewferry.com/massiveaction/

item.title: How to Pick a Life Coach
item.description:
How do you pick a life coach! I think that the main thing you need to do is decide what exactly you want to get out of the life coach process. For example, my specialty in the process is happiness and peace, and then utilizing that to be an action. But that’s not everybody’s specialty.

Please check out this powerful training program http://www.matthewferry.com/program/

item.title: Anger Fear and Doubt are too Expensive
item.description:
Have you ever felt like you were not enough?

Have you ever felt like you were spinning your wheels?

Have you ever been afraid that you’ll just never achieve the success that you want?

Have you ever wondered why others succeed with ease and you don’t?

Check it out for yourself, what do you have to lose? http://www.matthewferry.com/program/

item.title: Responsibility is Freedom
item.description:
A lot of people say, “If I take on a lot of responsibility, I’m going feel trapped and I won’t have the freedom that I want.” I’m here to tell you that, actually, that’s the exact opposite. The more responsibility you take on in your life, the projects, the things that you’re up to, the things that you’re committed to in your life, the more freedom you have. Because when you take responsibility, you basically say, “I am the creator of this. I’m going to make this happen.”

Please check out powerful training program:
http://www.matthewferry.com/program/

item.title: The Power of Connective Communication
item.description:
When you are outcome-oriented in your communication, you’re going to have a more difficult time communicating versus when you are connection-oriented. When your goal is to connect with a person, understand them and their world, to know who they are, see what they’re up to, you’re going to find that things just go effortlessly. It’s smooth. It’s easy. But when you’re selfishly oriented, trying to make what you want happen – trying to produce and outcome in your communication, you’re just going to find that things are difficult and hard.

I recommend that you spend your time working on being concerned, trying to understand, seeking to appreciate. And what you’ll find is: Communication is a breeze there.

Please check out powerful training program:
http://www.matthewferry.com/program/

item.title: Being Grateful will make you Optimistic
item.description:
How do you get in an optimal state. Well, consider that optimal is optimism. Optimism puts you in an optimal state. How do you get optimistic? Well, you have to acknowledge that what you have now is actually pretty darn good. You have to begin to get present to the fact that your life rocks, that you have got amazing stuff going on, that you have opportunities that other people do not have. I mean, the very fact that you are reading this on a computer means that you have a computer. That already puts you in like, the top five percent of all humans on earth. You get that? You have an amazing life.

Please check out powerful training program:
http://www.matthewferry.com/program/

item.description:

And why am I doing this? What is wrong with me? When you are in that place, you are emanating that which you don’t want.

item.title: Live to be Happy Today
item.description:
So many times my clients say to me, Well, Matthew, you know, this is just a means to an end. I am doing this business. I am doing this project because where it’s going to get me is where I want to go. You know what I say to that? Means to an end equals suffering. It means suffering today. And you do not have to do that. You don’t have to get involved in a project or do an activity today because hopefully, someday, it will turn out better so that you can be happy.

Please check out powerful training program:
http://www.matthewferry.com/program/

item.title: Different Does Not Equal Dangerous
item.description:
Stop protecting yourself from people who aren’t attacking you. Nobody is attacking you. People are just doing what they’re doing. They’re just doing the best they can. If there is someone yelling and screaming at you, it’s because, in some way, you have threatened them. Your existence has threatened their existence.

http://www.matthewferry.com/program/

item.title: Your Opinion is The Source of Your Suffering
item.description:
Do you think the world should bow down to your infinite wisdom, If so, that mindset will make you quite unhappy. No one really cares what you think. No one cares about your opinion. No one wants to know what you have to say. Everyone is just doing what they think will make them happy.

item.title: Other People Do Not Cause Your Suffering
item.description:
There are no jerks in the world until you show up. Do you get that. People are not anything until you label them and give your opinion about what they are. Now what we don’t like in people is what we are unwilling to accept about ourselves. What we do not like in people is what we are unwilling to accept about ourselves.

item.title: Happiness is a Skill
item.description:
To be unhappy it is just ignorant. Happiness is a skill. You can learn how to do it. All you gotta do is focus on accepting people exactly the way that they are, accepting yourself exactly the way that you are, accepting your situation exactly the way that it is. That is just a skill.

item.title: How to Instantly Improve Your Relationships
item.description:
If you want to be happier, more fulfilled and satisfied in life, then you need to stop holding people accountable to agreements they’ve never made. You know, you were raised by a group of people who basically conditioned into you. You were domesticated to believe that you should walk like this, move like that, talk like this, be like that, think these thoughts, see the world in this way, but you never chose the way that you are.

item.title: Being Grateful is Good for Your Health
item.description:
So it turns out that giving thanks is actually good for your health. According to Robert Emmons, a professor of psychology at the University of California-Davis, adults who frequently feel grateful have more energy, more optimism, more social connections, and more happiness than those who do not, according to studies conducted over the past decade.

Sign Up Today for Inspired Action Weekly and Receive bonuses including A Private Weekend Retreat with Matthew Ferry.
http://www.matthewferry.com/program/

item.title: Your Family is a Source of Happiness
item.description:
Happiness, ultimately, comes down to family. A Pew research project, from the Pew Research Center, did a 44-country study, and what they found was the biggest factor in happiness, across the board with people, was family.

item.title: Your Mind is a Source of Your Suffering
item.description:

item.title: Stop Predicting a Miserable Future
item.description:
If you want to be happy, then you need to stop pretending that you are psychic. You need to quit pretending that you can look at the outside of people and see who they are. You can not. You have no idea who people are. You look at someone and you think, Oh, that is what that person is. And then, they do something different, it breaks your expectations.

http://www.matthewferry.com/program/

item.title: How to be Happy
item.description:
There is a fallacy that says if you work really hard right now and make lots of money, then you will be able to make yourself happy. It does not work that way. So, what if you will make a lot of money and you get to the place where you envision. Oh, the clouds part, the sun is shining through, and there’s angels singing, and there is harps playing. But you are still be unhappy. Why, Because happiness is a skill. Happiness is not something that is externally located. So although you can get momentary hits of happiness through external things, ultimately, the long-term happiness comes from you implementing a set of skills.

4 Reasons 2011 Will suck and How to Make Sure It Wont
http://matthewferry.com/bestyearever2011/

item.title: 3 Actions That Create Happiness
item.description:

item.description:
